review: So far, so good.  This was relatively easy to set up and maneuver through the menu.  It had no problems connecting to my home WiFi.  My wife and I love the huge selection of free programs we can watch through our Prime account, but I haven't tried to watch Netflix through this device yet.  Unfortunately, I can't replace the small remote with my universal remote since there is no line of sight with the FireStick, and as such, the FireStick uses RF signals rather than the IR signals that my universal remote uses.  So we have to keep the FireStick remote next to my universal remote and hope it doesn't get misplaced since it's not that big.  A small price to pay for this device's functionality.  I will experiment with adding photos next.  So I may update my review in the near future.
